com.veriplace.web.spring
Class SetLocationPermissionInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.web.servlet.handler.HandlerInterceptorAdapter
      com.veriplace.web.spring.VeriplaceInterceptor
          com.veriplace.web.spring.SetLocationPermissionInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
HandlerExceptionResolver, HandlerInterceptor
public class SetLocationPermissionInterceptor
extends VeriplaceInterceptor

An Interceptor that does not allow requests to proceed until Veriplace has given permission to update the current user's location. This capability is not supported in the current Veriplace platform; see SetLocationAPI.

handleInternal in class VeriplaceInterceptor
